item.title: INCLUDE: Evaluating Multilingual Language Understanding with Regional Knowledge
item.description: New multilingual LLM benchmark, INCLUDE, tackles regional knowledge gaps by using 197K QA pairs from 44 languages, improving cross-lingual evaluation.
